answer.0: So this morning I read that Analysis The best thing Chief Justice Roberts wrote this term wasn't a Supreme Court opinion. Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. delivered eight opinions and two dissents in the just-concluded Supreme Court term.

fake_answer.2: After his return from Rome, Rob couldn't find his luggage in the airport baggage area, so he went to the lost luggage office and told the woman there that his bags hadn't shown up on the carousel.
